value.title: 5 ways to get Power BI Support #pbifamily
value.excerpt: Sometimes you need Power BI support. Even if you know a lot about Power BI, everyone has a brain fart from time to time. Adam looks at 5 different ways you can get Power BI support to get you past your hurdle.  Community Site: https://community.powerbi.com Twitter Hashtag: #PowerBI and #pbihelp Facebook
value.featuredContent: <iframe width="800" height="500" frameborder="0" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/OK9i3tuzUMc" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture" allowfullscreen></iframe>

images.title: 5 ways to get Power BI Support #pbifamily

value.title: Add a measure without Power BI Desktop (Premium)
value.excerpt: Need to add a measure to your Power BI dataset? Can't download it back in Power BI Desktop? Patrick shows you how you can still add that measure even though you can't use Power BI Desktop!  Tabular Editor 2 https://github.com/TabularEditor/TabularEditor  Tabular Editor 3 https://tabulareditor.com/  游닉

value.title: Are you backing up your Power BI Dataset???
value.excerpt: While Power BI is a SaaS service, backing up your dataset is still important. What if something was accidently deleted? How do you recover it? Patrick shows you how you can get a backup / restore process in place so you can sleep at night.  Backup/Restore PowerShell Script: https://guyinacu.be/backuprestorescript

value.title: Avoid Left Outer Joins with DirectQuery in Power BI
value.excerpt: By default, your DirectQuery queries, in Power BI, will send a LEFT OUTER JOIN and could make your DBA not happy! Patrick shows you how you can change this to an INNER JOIN and put your DBA back into that happy space.  游닉 Become a member: https://guyinacu.be/membership   *******************  Want

value.title: Configure data sources for Power BI Reports in Power BI Report Server
value.excerpt: In this video, I show you how you can configure the data source of a Power BI report within Power BI Report Server. This comes in really handy when you want to get around the Kerberos Constrained Delegation requirements and avoid having to configure kerberos - which can be a pain.  LET'S CONNECT!  Guy

value.title: Debug DAX using Variables in Power BI
